description: Generate recommendations for a lineup job schedule shift
permissions: User must be allowed to update the referenced lineup job schedule shift (LineupJobScheduleShiftPolicy#update?); admins are permitted. The lineup job schedule shift relationship must be present.
side_effects: Creates a lineup job schedule shift trucker assignment recommendation and computes ranked candidates.
validation_notes: --lineup-job-schedule-shift is required. Candidates are generated server-side and must be present; creation fails if recommendation scoring cannot produce candidates (for example: missing lineup job schedule shift, no candidate truckers, no feature rows for candidates, model file missing, or score count mismatch).
